nodes.text: The Ansata were from the Ansata system located in the Core Worlds. They had particular symbols indicating devotion to knowledge and learning. Jocasta Nu, a Jedi Master and Jedi archivist for the Jedi Order, wore robes with traditional Ansata patterns, and Ansata hair sticks, indicating her personal devotion to these qualities. Atris was known to wear similar symbols on her robes.

The Ansata were first mentioned in Star Wars: Attack of the Clones: The Visual Dictionary, published in 2002. They later received mentions in The Official Star Wars Fact File 41 and the Star Wars Databank, and The Essential Atlas created the Ansata system. Within these sources, it is unclear whether the Ansata are a culture or species; consequently, this article treats them as a generic organization.
